phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
And so, we are giving you your first mission.
Our first mission...
Wh-What is it?
It had better be something worthy of me as a royal.
Yeah, you should be honored.
You will be hunting wild boars in Saussy Village!
Wild...
Boar!
What kind of lame mission is that?
What are you calling lame?!
I can beat a wild boar with my bare hands!
Do not you dare underestimate wild boars!
Are you going to go, or are you going to die?
Which will it be?
We will go!
Even if it is just hunting wild boars, this is our first mission as Magic Knights.
I am so excited!
I am supposed to get rid of wild boars?
What?
You are still complaining?
I am not complaining...
It is just...
I was just wondering if I should go, since I cannot control my magical powers.
Her name is...
Crazy Cyclone!
Crazy Cyclone
So cool!
I know, right?!
Is not she a beaut?
Yeah, she is!
Lame.
A man never goes back on his word!
Here we go!
Fly!
Yahoo!
This is amazing, Magna!
We are one with the wind!
And if you do not want to die, better squeeze up closer, Stupidsta!
Yes, sir!
So this is where the magic stone is located.
We are going to find it.
Yes, sir!
Be lost in the mist.
Beasts
Grey words cannot make anything happen
I know, yeah I know
Wishing to fly freely across the sky
I dreamed it all my life
Step by step I go, though it is a doubtful world
Do not care how much I fall
Instinct is my guide, I never give up
To faraway future, I burst out running
Go beyond even the unseen fears
The vision I had, so I can be myself
Someday I will write the next page
You are my hope
Like that page from someday
I was able to meet you
I call this a miracle
A wild boar's after me!
It is huge!
Actually, is that even a wild boar?!
Is not it using some magic of its own?!
It is super fast!
Should not we rescue him?
I am taking a break.
My magical powers are pretty much drained after flying you two this far.
I am sure he will be fine.
He is pretty tough.
But...
If you are so worried, you go save him.
I can do this.
Why me?!
I have got you now!
I finally got'i am.
Great job, Asta.
But it are not over yet.
What a haul!
You are pretty amazing.
Three or four wild boars are not nothing.
You have got some impressive brute strength.
This should make Old Man Seihi happy.
Let us have ourselves a wild boar party.
This mayor of Saussy Village... Seihi?
You know him?
Yeah.
I have known him for a long time.
I am from Rayaka Village, which is just past here,
Used to be?
Like you are not now?
I got a big head after I got my grimoire
and went into Saussy Village with the intent of taking over, too.
And then...
Take that!
Hey, you little brat!
What do you think you are doing?!
You want to get hurt, old man?
You are the one that is going to get hurt!
Take that!
Time for your punishment!
That is dangerous!
And now...
Wh-What the hell are you doing?
Time for an ass whoopin'!
Hey!
Damn it!
Since then, I have challenged that old man many times.
Real men do not make trouble for others!
Take that!
Help the weak and humble the strong.
That is what a true man does.
Golden!
Real men do not make others worry about them.
He whooped my ass every time.
He must be strong.
I found this out later, but Old Man Seihi
had enough magical power that he aspired to be a Magic Knight when he was younger.
He is the one who suggested that I take the Magic Knights Entrance Exam.
Oh?
Looks like you have improved a bit.
W-Well, I am getting the hang of using my grimoire.
In that case, why do not you try taking the Magic Knights Entrance Exam?
Huh?
M-Me? Take the entrance exam?
You have got skill.
There is... no way that will happen.
I am a commoner from the boonies.
Nothing's written in stone!
What does being from the boonies or being a commoner have to do with anything?
It is up to you to take hold of your own future.
I am sure you will be able to fulfill the dream I could not.
Old Man...
Be a man, Magna.
So what do Magic Knights do, anyway?
You do not even know that?!
It is all because of him that I am here right now.
When I passed the Magic Knights Entrance Exam, he was happier for me than anyone.
He must be a nice person.
Yeah.
And he went to the royal capital...
well, to get rich quick so he could make some money for his village,
but I think he also came to see me.
He did take me for every bit of change I had, though!
But he is the one who showed me what a real man should be.
I wanted to be like him, the person I respect most after Mister Yami...
Magna?
The hell is that?!
The village...
It is covered in mist.
Wow, the weather sucks in that town.
You idiot!
That is magic.
What?!
Saussy Village
A magical mist?
Once we enter it, we probably will not be able to get anywhere.
We will lose our sense of direction and end up wandering around in the mist.
Magic that can cover a whole village...
None of the villagers have magic this strong.
Of course, this is not Old Man Seihi's magic, either.
What is going on?
Hey!
Yes, sir?
Cut through the mist with your sword.
Sure thing!
Huh?
That is a dumb thing to say.
You cannot cut through mist with a sword.
You are the dumb one!
Since it is magic, you can cut through it with your sword!
Oh, yeah!
Good.
Now, let us go.
Right!
Take a right there.
Got it!
Take a left there.
Right!
You seem to know where you are going.
Well, yeah.
Left.
Did you feel that?
Yes.
Powerful magic.
Straight ahead.
Be careful.
We should end up in the square.
This is your execution.
Explosive Scattershot!
The Magic Knights...
They have come to save us!
Magna, it is you!
Nick!
What the heck's going on?
Old Man!
Hey!
Wake up!
Old Man...
The mayor...
He tried to protect us.
Grandpa, they came.
The Magic Knights...
Your prayers were answered.
A person can just die... so easily?
Are you the bastard who did this?!
How dare you put me behind schedule?
You will all be executed in ten seconds.
Crap!
I am short on magic!
Asta!
I will not forgive this!
How could you do something so cruel?
Who the heck are you guys?!
They do not seem like spies from the Diamond Kingdom
or barbarians here to trash the village.
Who are these guys?
I do not recall hearing anything about Magic Knights showing up.
Could they be out on some unofficial mission?
And how did they get into the village through our mist barrier?
The Black Bulls...
Crude heretics that do not fit in with the rest of the Magic Knights.
Dealing with them would be a waste of time.
Five minutes...
We will get rid of the useless villagers that did not know anything
and seek what we came here for.
Do not ignore me!
Mist Magic: Whirlpool of Illusory Mist.
You are a fool to think you could get near Lord Heath so easily.
Damn you!
Be lost in the mist.
No, I will not!
He cut through my ice magic earlier.
I do not know what kind of magic he uses...
But his sword negates magic.
We should not let him get too close.
I am asking you why you tried to kill all these villagers!
This world is split into several regions.
Forsaken Realm
Common Realm
Noble Realm
Diamond Kingdom
Heart Kingdom
Saussy
Rayaka
The Noble Realm where royalty lives, the Common Realm where the commoners live,
Spade Kingdom
and the Forsaken Realm.
Huh?
This village, Saussy, is located in the Forsaken Realm.
Most of those who inhabit the Forsaken Realm are
an inferior race that can only use enough magic to complete daily tasks.
They are basically mindless beasts.
I was only trying to get rid of the mindless beasts
that might steal more of my precious time.
Beasts?
The three of you
also had enough magical power to join the Magic Knights, did you not?
You are only trying to save them because it is your mission.
But in truth, they look like lowly beasts to you, do they not?
Living in the upper realms must be nice.
I am sure they are living a life of luxury.
If you are so jealous, you should just go there.
It is not that easy.
Why not?
Only those who possess strong magical powers can live in the realms above us.
There is prejudice against those who lack magical powers.
Even though we are all human.
Huh...
Then after I join the Magic Knights and become the Wizard King,
I will get rid of those prejudices and make our village flourish even more!
Thank you, Asta.
If the likes of you could manage that, we would not be struggling.
What did you say, you brat?!
I am older than you!
You could not even join the Magic Knights, let alone become the Wizard King.
You do not even have any magical powers.
Hey!
Those people you called beasts
are lives I have to protect!
I see.
So the filthy beasts are that valuable to you.
I will send those icicles right back at y
Th-This is...
Ice and Mist Compound Magic: Endless Ice Cage.
Do you think you can protect those beasts now?
I am not very partial to the term gradually,
but this seems like it will be the most effective.
Asta!
Dissolve.
Not only can you negate magic, you can repel it, as well.
But that is not enough to defeat me.
The blades of ice will come one after another.
Now, just try and protect them.
Damn you!
It is going to take everything Asta and I have to protect the villagers.
Not to mention, my powers are reaching their limit.
And they have four guys who are at least Magic Knight level.
And that guy's still hiding his true powers!
This turned out to be one hell of a first mission for those two!
This is not good!
But if I cut and run now, I am not a real man!
It just so happens I am a lowly commoner myself!
I will protect you!
Magna!
I wonder how long you will last.
To think one of you cannot even control her powers...
I guess the Black Bulls were truly desperate for members.
These frail little beasts who cannot even protect themselves...
If you abandon them, I will let you live, Magic Knights.
Like hell I will abandon them!
A real man does not abandon anybody!
I am... royalty.
I have more magical power than anyone else here.
Step back, Lady Noe!
And yet I am just holding them back!
There is no reason for me to be here.
If you abandon them, I will let you live...
That is right.
I am royalty.
I am not supposed to die in a village like this.
I should just run
Miss Magic Knight...
Save us!
This little girl is asking for help.
I am going to protect them!
A new spell?
There is no way...
I can run now!
I will protect them!
I am royalty,
and a member of the Black Bulls!
No one can escape from here
Once again in the small closed off classroom
The star of the class was shining yet again
They shine so bright that I close my eyes
I have thought many times
That the revolution was within my hands
Is not it strange?
If you want to laugh, go ahead and laugh
The rest of us who were left behind wanted to become something
We repeat the same morning over and over
You are the only one who can choose your tomorrow
Let us go beyond our current selves
Petit Clover!
Separation and Reunion
Boar, boar, boar... boar, boar, boar.
Boar, boar, boar, boar...
I am sorry I destroyed the fields!
Oh, all right.
Just do not do it again!
I will not!
Boar!
Boar!
Boar!
Take care!
Check out Black Clover next week, too!
Boar!
That is awesome, Noelle!
A path will always open, as long as you do not give up!
We are going to protect everyone, no matter what!
Black Clover, Page 10: Those Who Protect.
Page 10 Those Who Protect
Not giving up is my magic!
